metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39562 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in swftools through 20200710. A NULL pointer dereference exists in the function FileStream::makeSubStream() located in Stream.cc. It allows an attacker to cause Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: swftools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
